definitions.definition: In a regretful manner, with regret .
Unfortunately , in a manner inspiring or deserving regret; used only as a sentence adverb (to introduce and modify an entire sentence).

main_definition: In a regretful manner, with regret .
secondary_definitions: ( proscribed ) Unfortunately , in a manner inspiring or deserving regret; used only as a sentence adverb (to introduce and modify an entire sentence).
